example.name: with extent
example.text: Yesterday , even before the resignations were announced [*-1] , the index dove 32.5 points [*-2]to close at 2129.4 .
example.arg: even before the resignations were announced [*-1]

example.name: all arguments
example.text: Earnings before interest and tax from brewing dived 50 % to A$ 123.8 million [*U*] from A$ 247.3 million [*U*].
example.arg: Earnings before interest and tax from brewing

example.name: intransitive
example.text: Individual investors , investment firms and arbitragers who [*T*-1] speculate in the stocks of takeover candidates can suffer liquidity and payment problems when stocks dive [*T*-2]; those investors often borrow heavily [*-3] to buy their holdings and use the stocks as collateral for loans .

example.name: slightly different arg 1
example.text: Friday's dive in stock market prices
